title: Need Players for Ranked Team
body:
Hey guys we need a few players for our ranked 5 team we are all diamond/plat but will take gold+ just after the end of season rewards. we need a jungler/ top and support.
Please add me in game "Staller" or post below.

replies.body: im plat 3 in promo to plat 2 jungle and support main
Staller, im silver, but... can u test me a skills of support? or Top? ==' i need team rank from s3 ==' OMG!!
Hey, I am Gold 1, got demoted from Plat (ugh). Am a Support and Mid main, can play more or less any and every champ :)
Hey currently gold 5 i would be willing to play jungler/top im pretty active so feel free to add me and you can trial me out if needed
